name: Prometheus Paperless NGX Exporter
description: Prometheus metrics exporter for Paperless-NGX, a document management system transforming physical documents into a searchable online archive. The exporter relies on Paperless' REST API.

notes.text: Please adjust the Paperless URL in the systemd unit file: /etc/systemd/system/prometheus-paperless-ngx-exporter.service
Please adjust the Paperless authentication token in the configuration file: /etc/prometheus-paperless-ngx-exporter/paperless_auth_token_file
